description: Gets information about a set of featured results. Features results are placed above all other results for certain queries. If there's an exact match of a query, then one or more specific documents are featured in the search results.

parameters.name: IndexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the index used for featuring results.

parameters.name: FeaturedResultsSetId
parameters.description: The identifier of the set of featured results that you want to get information on.

nested_items.name: FeaturedResultsSetId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the set of featured results.

nested_items.name: FeaturedResultsSetName
nested_items.description: The name for the set of featured results.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description for the set of featured results.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the set of featured results. When the value is ACTIVE, featured results are ready for use. You can still configure your settings before setting the status to ACTIVE. You can set the status to ACTIVE or INACTIVE using the UpdateFeaturedResultsSet API. The queries you specify for featured results must be unique per featured results set for each index, whether the status is ACTIVE or INACTIVE.

nested_items.name: QueryTexts
nested_items.description: The list of queries for featuring results. For more information on the list of queries, see FeaturedResultsSet.

nested_items.name: FeaturedDocumentsWithMetadata
nested_items.description: The list of document IDs for the documents you want to feature with their metadata information. For more information on the list of featured documents, see FeaturedResultsSet.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the featured document with its metadata. You can use the Query API to search for specific documents with their document IDs included in the result items, or you can use the console.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The main title of the featured document.

nested_items.name: URI
nested_items.description: The source URI location of the featured document.

nested_items.name: FeaturedDocumentsMissing
nested_items.description: The list of document IDs that don't exist but you have specified as featured documents. Amazon Kendra cannot feature these documents if they don't exist in the index. You can check the status of a document and its ID or check for documents with status errors using the BatchGetDocumentStatus API.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the document that doesn't exist but you have specified as a featured document.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the set of featured results was last updated.

nested_items.name: CreationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the set of the featured results was created.
